PersonalStatement.text: Andrew Wells, born on 1971-01-03, is a Male based in Jeremytown, Malawi. He is Divorced and holds German nationality. Currently working at Cline Ltd.

WorkExperience.text: Financial Analyst at Johnson, King and Bray from 2014 to 2017.
Senior Project Manager at Cline Ltd, 2020 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: Master's in Financial Economics from Católica de Córdoba
Master's in Engineering from Freie Universitaet Berlin

PersonalSkills.text: Problem-solving: Skilled in troubleshooting and optimizing complex systems.
Leadership: Proven track record of managing cross-functional teams.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, he enjoys photography.
